00020    * Constructor.

00022    Domain::Domain()
00023     : Util::ParamComposite(),
00024       sourceRanks_(),
00025       destRanks_(),
00026       shift_(),
00027       gridDimensions_(),
00028       gridCoordinates_(),
00029       gridRank_(-1),
00030       gridIsPeriodic_(),
00031       #if UTIL_MPI

00068    /*
00069    * Read parameters and initialize.
00070    */
00071    void Domain::readParam(std::istream& in)
00072    {
00073 
00074       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00075       if (intracommPtr_ == 0) {
00076          UTIL_THROW("Intra-communicator not set before readParam");
00077       } 
00078       #endif
00079       if (gridRank_ < 0) {
00080          UTIL_THROW("grid rank not set before readParam");
00081       }
00082       if (!hasBoundary()) {
00083          UTIL_THROW("Boundary not set before readParam");
00084       }
00085       if (isInitialized_) {
00086          UTIL_THROW("readParam can only be called once");
00087       }
00088 
00089       // Read parameter file 
00090       readBegin(in, "Domain");
00091       read<IntVector>(in, "gridDimensions", gridDimensions_);
00092       readEnd(in);
00093 
00094       // Validate gridDimensions
00095       int nproc = 1;
00096       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; i++) {
00097           if (gridDimensions_[i] <= 0) {
00098              UTIL_THROW("Processor grid dimensions must be greater than 0");
00099           }
00100           nproc *= gridDimensions_[i];
00101       }
00102       int commSize = 1;
00103       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00104       commSize = intracommPtr_->Get_size();
00105       #endif
00106       if (nproc != commSize) {
00107          UTIL_THROW("Grid dimensions inconsistent with communicator size");
00108       }
00109 
00110       // Set grid dimensions
00111       grid_.setDimensions(gridDimensions_);
00112 
00113       // Mark all directions as periodic.
00114       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; i++) {
00115          gridIsPeriodic_[i] = true;
00116       }
00117 
00118       // Find grid coordinates for this processor
00119       gridCoordinates_ = grid_.position(gridRank_);
00120 
00121       IntVector sourceCoordinates;
00122       int       i, j, k, jp;
00123 
00124       // Loop over Cartesian direction for send
00125       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00126 
00127          // Loop over increment sign (+1 or -1 grid coordinate i)
00128          for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
00129 
00130             // Increment to source along coordinate i
00131             k  = (j == 0 ? 1 : -1);
00132               
00133             // Complementary index (other direction)
00134             jp = (j == 0 ? 1 :  0);
00135 
00136             //Initialize coordinates of the partner processor
00137             sourceCoordinates    = gridCoordinates_;
00138             sourceCoordinates[i] = gridCoordinates_[i] + k;
00139 
00140             // Check for transfer past boundary
00141             if (gridIsPeriodic_[i] == true) {
00142                shift_(i, j) = grid_.shift(sourceCoordinates[i], i);
00143                sourceRanks_(i, j) = grid_.rank(sourceCoordinates);
00144                destRanks_(i, jp)  = sourceRanks_(i, j);
00145             } else {
00146                shift_(i, j)  = 0;
00147                if (!grid_.isInGrid(sourceCoordinates[i], i)) {
00148                   destRanks_(i, j)    = -1;
00149                   sourceRanks_(i, jp) = -1;
00150                }
00151             }
00152       
00153          }
00154       }
00155       isInitialized_ = true;
00156    }
00157 
00158    /*
00159    * Return one of the boundaries of the domain owned by this processor.
00160    */
00161    double Domain::domainBound(int i, int j) const
00162    {
00163       // Preconditions
00164       assert(isInitialized_);
00165       assert(boundaryPtr_);
00166       assert(i >= 0);
00167       assert(i < Dimension);
00168       assert(j >= 0);
00169       assert(j < 2);
00170 
00171       double dL;
00172       if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00173          dL = boundaryPtr_->length(i) / double(gridDimensions_[i]);
00174       } else {
00175          dL = 1.0 / double(gridDimensions_[i]);
00176       }
00177       return (gridCoordinates_[i] + j)*dL;
00178    }
00179 
00180    /*
00181    * Return rank of processor whose domain contains a position Vector.
00182    */
00183    int Domain::ownerRank(const Vector& position) const
00184    {
00185       // Preconditions
00186       assert(isInitialized_);
00187       assert(boundaryPtr_);
00188 
00189       double dL;
00190       IntVector r;
00191       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00192          if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00193             dL = boundaryPtr_->length(i) / double(gridDimensions_[i]);
00194          } else {
00195             dL = 1.0 / double(gridDimensions_[i]);
00196          }
00197          r[i] = int(position[i] / dL);
00198          if (r[i] < 0 || r[i] >= gridDimensions_[i]) {
00199             UTIL_THROW("Invalid grid coordinate");
00200          }
00201       }
00202       return grid_.rank(r);
00203    }
00204 
00205    /*
00206    * Does a Vector lie in the domain owned by this processor?
00207    */
00208    bool Domain::isInDomain(const Vector& position) const
00209    {
00210       // Preconditions
00211       assert(isInitialized_);
00212       assert(boundaryPtr_);
00213 
00214       double dL;
00215       bool isIn = true;
00216       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {  
00217          if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00218             dL = boundaryPtr_->length(i) / double(gridDimensions_[i]);
00219          } else {
00220             dL = 1.0 / double(gridDimensions_[i]);
00221          }
00222          if (position[i] <   gridCoordinates_[i]*dL) {
00223             isIn = false;
00224          }
00225          if (position[i] >= (gridCoordinates_[i] + 1)*dL) {
00226             isIn = false;
00227          }
00228       }
00229       return isIn;
00230    }
